data.title: Wilhelm-Eakin Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Obituaries and announcements from Wilhelm-Eakin Funeral Home, as published in Cumberland Times News
data.text:
William Wasson Simpson IV Obituary

Lonaconing

William Wasson Simpson IV, 83, formerly of Lonaconing, passed away on Sunday, Aug. 18, 2024, at UPMC-Western Maryland, Cumberland. Born on Sept. 22, 1940, in Baltimore, he was the son of the late William Wasson Simpson III and Marie Delores (Gould) Simpson.

He was preceded by a grandson, John Bannon.

William and his wife often attended the methodist church. He...

Carol A. Burt Obituary

Midland

Carol A. Burt, 89, of Midland, passed away peacefully on Aug. 14, 2024, at Peace Healthcare, Frostburg. Born on Aug. 29, 1934, she was the daughter of the late Frank and Freda Wilson of Midland.

Carol was the beloved wife of the late Kenneth R. Burt, who died in 2009. She was also preceded in death by her son, Bob, who died in September of 2022.

Carol was...

Glenn French Miller Obituary

Lonaconing

Glenn French Miller, 75, Lonaconing, passed away peacefully on Friday, Aug. 9, 2024, at his home with his devoted wife by his side.

Born April 13, 1949, in Frostburg, he was the son of the late Peryl (French) and Aden T. Miller. He was also preceded in death by his brother, Aden C. Miller.

Glenn is survived by his wife of 51 years Bonnie Fairgrieve Miller;...

Glenn French Miller Obituary

Lonaconing

LONACONING [mdash] Glenn French Miller, 75, Lonaconing, passed away peacefully on Friday, August 9, at his home with his devoted wife by his side.

Born April 13, 1949, in Frostburg, he was the son of the late Peryl (French) and Aden T. Miller. He was also preceded in death by his brother, Aden C. Miller.

Glenn is survived by his wife of 51 years, Bonnie...

Robert Andrew Brodie Sr. (Bob) Obituary

Lonaconing

Robert "Bob" Andrew Brodie, Sr., 83, of 60 East Main Street, Lonaconing, died Saturday, Aug. 3, 2024, at his residence. Born on Sept. 19, 1940, in Lonaconing, he was the son of the late Robert M. Brodie and Erma (Hutcheson) Brodie.

Together with his parents, he was also preceded in death by his in-laws, Harry M. and Anna T. Beeman. On May 25th of this year, he...

James Brennan Mills (Brennie) Obituary

Mt. Savage

James "Brennie" Brennan Mills, 95, previously from Midland, passed away quietly on the morning of July 26, 2024, at his son, Leo's, in Mount Savage. He was the son of the late Joseph Mills and Nellie (McGowan) Mills. He was the last surviving member of his immediate family.

He is preceded in death by his beloved wife of over 60 years, Ann L. (Kenny) Mills.

He...

Patricia Seib Martin (Trish) Obituary

Frostburg

Patricia "Trish" Seib Martin, 87, went to be with her Lord and Savior on Monday, July 22, 2024, at Sterling Care, Frostburg. She was born in Ocean Hill, Md. to the late Isabell (Rae) Seib and John J. Seib Sr.

Together with her parents she was also preceded in death by her husband, Ernest Martin; five sisters, Mary Brant, Agnes Dawson, Betty Mauer, Anna Jean...

Harry Ronald Shaw (Ronnie) Obituary

Lonaconing

Harry "Ronnie" Ronald Shaw, 87, of Sunlight Drive, Lonaconing, went to be with our Lord and Savior on Sunday, July 14th, 2024 at his home. Born on Jan. 27th, 1937, he was the son of the late Harry Shaw and Marie (O'Halloran) Shaw.

He was preceded in death by his loving wife, Martha Shaw; and sister, Mary "Norma" Nelson.

Ronnie was a 1956 graduate of Valley...

Joyce Lynn Williams Obituary

Morgantown

Joyce Lynn Williams, 68, recently of Morgantown, W.Va., was called home by her Lord Savior on July 12, 2024. Born on June 21, 1956, in Cumberland, Md., she was the daughter of the late Harold William Moyer and Ida Mae (McIntyre) Moyer.

Along with her parents, she was also preceded in death by her brother, Harold Richard Moyer.

Joyce was a 1974 graduate of...

Donald Lee Russell Jr. (Donnie) Obituary

Barton

BARTON [mdash] Donald Lee Russell Jr., 64, of Michael Road, Barton, died Friday, June 14, 2024 at Potomac Valley Hospital, Keyser.

Born on August 26, 1959, he was the son of the late Donald Lee Russell Sr., and Thelma (Guthrie) Russell. He was preceded in death by his brother, Gary Dwayne Russell.

Donnie was a 1977 graduate of Valley High School.

He was a...

Robert Andrew Brodie (Andy) Obituary

Lonaconing

Robert "Andy" Andrew Brodie Jr., 55, of Water Station Run Road, Lonaconing died Saturday, May 25, 2024, at his residence. Born on Nov. 14, 1968, in Cumberland he is the son of Robert Andrew Brodie Sr. and Karina Katherine (Beeman) Brodie of Lonaconing.

He was preceded in death by his grandparents, Bob and Erma Brodie and Harry and Anna Beeman.

Andy was a...

Joanne E. Wilson Obituary

Rockville

Joanne E. Wilson, 83, of Rockville, Md., passed away Thursday, April 4, 2024. Born Aug. 19, 1940, in Klondike (formerly Lordes), Md., she was the daughter to the late Samuel Leptic, and Helen (Brown/Leptic) Adams.

She was preceded in death by her son, Calvin "Jack" Wilson; and her brother, Samuel "Sonny" Leptic; and her sister, Julia (Adams) Beeman.

Joanne...

Rickie Edward Powell Obituary

Lonaconing

Rickie Edward Powell, 66, of Lower Georges Creek Road, Lonaconing, passed peacefully at his residence on Sunday, March 31, 2024, after a very brief bout of cancer. Born on Aug. 14, 1957, in Cumberland, he was the son of the late Billy Junior Powell Sr. and Anna Lee (Henry) Powell. He was preceded in death by his parents; a special aunt, Betty Powell; and a...

Charles Thomas Clise Jr. (Tom) Obituary

Hedgesville

Charles "Tom" Thomas Clise Jr., 78, of Hedgesville, W.Va., formerly of Frostburg, died Monday, Feb. 26, 2024, at WVU Medicine Berkley Medical Center, Martinsburg, W.Va. Born on Sept. 7, 1945, in Lonaconing, he was the son of the late Charles Thomas Clise, Sr. and Ruth Beckley (Doub) Clise.

Tom was a 1963 graduate of Valley High School, where he played in the...

Audrey Phyllis Bell Obituary

Lonaconing

Audrey Phyllis Bell, 84, of High Street, Lonaconing, died Wednesday, Feb. 21, 2024, at Peace Healthcare, Frostburg. Born on Sept. 18, 1939, she was the daughter of the late Leslie Cutter and Beulah (Bittinger) Cutter.

She was preceded in death by her beloved husband, Glenn Bell on Sept. 17, 2023; a daughter, Karen (Bell) Yob; a granddaughter, Amanda; and her...

Kristin Marie McCoy Obituary

Cumberland

Kristin Marie (Creegan) McCoy, 43, of Cumberland, died Sunday, Feb. 11, 2024, at home. Born on Dec. 18, 1980, in Cumberland, she was the daughter of Scott Creegan of Florida and Dina (Foote) Creegan of Lonaconing.

She was preceded in death by her sister, Heather Creegan.

Kristin was raised Catholic and was a graduate of Allegany High School. After graduation...

Gene Ray House Obituary

Lonaconing

Gene Ray House, of Lonaconing, was welcomed into Heaven on Feb. 2, 2024. He was the son of the late Geraldine and Vernon Whiteman. Gene graduated from Valley High School and married Cassandra (Sandy) shortly after and moved to New Jersey. He went on to work at Stroehmann's Bakery and then to Westvaco and Mead-New Page where he retired after over 37 years. Gene...

Sandra Gail Smith (Sandi) Obituary

Midland

Sandra "Sandi" Gail Smith, 72, of Paradise Street, Midland, died Sunday, Jan. 7, 2024, at Moran Manor, Westernport. Born on April 3, 1951, in Cumberland, she was the daughter of the late George Wilson and Elsie (Coyle) Wilson Hare.

She was preceded in death by her husband, Donald Smith; and a brother, Tommy Wilson.

Sandi was a graduate of Beall High School...

Mary Ann Schurg Obituary

Midland

MIDLAND [mdash] Mary Ann Schurg, 74, of Midland, died Wed., Jan. 3, 2024, at UPMC Shadyside, Pittsburgh. She was the daughter of the late William Festerman Jr. and Agnes C. (Klosterman) Festerman.

She was preceded in death by her beloved husband, Carl Schurg Sr., and two sisters, Sharon and Jeanie Kay.

Diona Kay Andrews Obituary

Barton

Early Wednesday morning, Jan. 3, 2024, Diona Kay (Getson) Andrews walked through Heaven's Gate, perfect and fully restored. She was born on April 26, 1948, to the late William F. and Mary C. (Lambert) Getson, and was the "big sister" of the late Terrance "Mike" Getson. She was the last surviving member of her immediate family.

Jane Blair Kroll Obituary

Fort Ashby

Jane Blair Kroll, 85, of Fort Ashby, W.Va., died Sunday, Dec. 31, 2023, at UPMC-Western Maryland, Cumberland. Born on Dec. 18, 1938, she was the daughter of the late John and Virginia Blair.

She was preceded in death by her beloved husband, Jack Kroll, on May 2, 2015; and two brothers, Richard and Stuart Blair.
